/usr/local/cuda/bin/nvcc -forward-unknown-to-host-compiler  --generate-code=arch=compute_70,code=[compute_70,sm_70] -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink --options-file CMakeFiles/halo_test.dir/deviceObjects1.rsp -o CMakeFiles/halo_test.dir/cmake_device_link.o --options-file CMakeFiles/halo_test.dir/deviceLinkLibs.rsp
